Marketing

Cutting through the noise, and getting your listings sold effortlessly.

Professional Photography

Mirrorless & DSLR photography

Our in-house photographic team can on demand shoot and provide our member agents with edited HD photos. An online databank of local area pictures is available to our agents.

Professional Videography

Walkthroughs & Aerial Drone videography

Our in-house photographic team can on demand shoot and provide our member agents with 4K video walk-thru tours of their mandates. Drone photos and videos are also available on request – where the neighbour’s permission has been granted.

Virtual reality

Our in-house photographic team can on demand shoot and provide our member agents with 4K video walk-thru tours of their mandates. Drone photos and videos are also available on request – where the neighbour’s permission has been granted.

Graphic-design

Bespoke in-house graphic design

Continuous creation of marketing material & an online databank of hundreds of templates which can be personalized for our member agents on request.

Our property portals

CCH syndicate our mandates to all the top property portals in South Africa – in fact to 42 local websites. Our mandates are also uploaded on some of the top international websites – such as Rightmove and JamesEdition.

Domestic Portals

International Portals

Social media

We have an immense and active presence on social media across multiple sites. Offering rich content, with which our followers can engage in. offering us the unqiue ability to not only market your properties, but also to market the lifestyle of these properties.

Facebook

Instagram

Youtube

Pinterest

Data-driven targeted Advertisements

We offer in house-specialised targeted ads for that extra mile to get your mandates sold quickly. Matching your mandates characteristics seamlessly with that of the market.

Facebook

We have the ability to create custom “buckets” with their own unique data points that we use through the Facebook portal to target potential leads with relevant information regarding our mandates.

Youtube

We can run specialised targeted video ads and keyword google advertisement to ensure that there is a constant stream of new leads.
